sentences.en: A widely used device for managerial control is the budget.
sentences.cn: 在管理控制上,广泛使用的技术是预算.

sentences.en: All the managerial personnel at the factory are hired on contract.
sentences.cn: 工厂所有管理人员都是聘用的.

sentences.en: Finally, Matsushita promotes managerial continuity through long job tenure.
sentences.cn: 最后松下通过延长任职期,推进管理的延续性.

sentences.en: He also thought of his managerial position.
sentences.cn: 他又想到了他的经理的职位.

sentences.en: He has also had managerial experience on every level.
sentences.cn: 他还有各个层级的管理经验。

sentences.en: His treatment of his secretary was a blatant example of managerial arrogance.
sentences.cn: 他管理的傲慢作风在他对待秘书的态度上表露无遗.

sentences.en: I really love the area and see it as an ideal place to start my managerial career.
sentences.cn: 我真的很喜欢那个地区，把它视为开创我管理事业的理想之地。

sentences.en: Managerial candidates differ widely in age, economic position, and maturity.
sentences.cn: 管理候选人在年令 、 经济地位以及熟练程度上,都有很大的差别.

sentences.en: She was promoted into some kind of managerial job.
sentences.cn: 她被提拔去做某种管理工作.

sentences.en: Some see themselves as the provider of ideas, while others view their role as essen-tially managerial.
sentences.cn: 有些人自认为是出谋划策的人，其他人则认为他们主要是起管理方面的作用。

sentences.en: The clerk was elevated to a managerial position.
sentences.cn: 那个职员被提升到经理职位.

sentences.en: The partnership has the advantage of pooling managerial talent.
sentences.cn: 合伙企业的优点是能够把合伙人的管理才能汇集在一起.

sentences.en: There are engineering and managerial resources in that plant.
sentences.cn: 那个工厂有工程及管理人材.

sentences.en: They kept extolling my managerial skills.
sentences.cn: 他们不停地赞美我的管理技能。

sentences.en: To be sure, most managerial actions do not benefit from vagueness.
sentences.cn: 可以肯定, 大多数管理措施从含糊其辞中得不到好处.

words.tran_cn: 易管理的；易控制的；易办的
管理；管理人员；管理部门；操纵；经营手段
授权；命令，指令；委托管理；受命进行的工作

phrases.tran_cn: 管理功能；治理职能；治理功能
管理职位；治理职位；经理职位会
管理心理学；治理心理学

trans.tran_en: relating to the job of a manager
